filesystem
Class File

java.lang.Object
  filesystem.FileSystemItem
      filesystem.File

public class File
extends FileSystemItem

This class implements the behavior of concrete files. Composite-Pattern: Leaf

Responsibilities:

  • represents leaf objects in the composition. A leaf has no children.
  • defines behavior for primitive objects in the composition.

    Constructor Detail

    File

    public File(java.lang.String name,
            java.lang.String fileContent)
    Constructor.

    Parameters:
    name - A name for the file. Note that file names may not contain '\' '/' ':' ',' ';' and ' '.
    fileContent - Any string which represents the content of the file. The content may not contain characters like ',' and ';'.
